title: No, Dr. Dennis Mocwig didn't say that Corona's virus cases were visiting.
subtitle: Mukwej, a famous gynecologist, resigned from his post with the task force that responded to COVID-19 in the Congo, but not for the reason given in one of the mimas.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: Dr. Denis Mukwej said that he had resigned from the Krona HIV Task Force in the Democratic Republic of the Congo because he had been offered money to forge COVID-19 cases.
